## Create plotly

```{r echo=TRUE}
df <- sim_norm()
df
```

```{r}
ggp <- df %>%
  filter(var != "(Intercept)") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Estimate, y = var, xmin = Estimate - Std..Error,
               xmax = Estimate + Std..Error, color = model)) +
  geom_pointrange(position = position_dodge(width = 0.5),
                  fatten = 8, size = 2) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        legend.title = element_blank()) +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL)
ply <- ggplotly(ggp)
ply
```
